title: Bug with Nasus's Q making his attack animation go in super slow motion.
body:
I don't know what's doing it but it started happening and happened a few times after I purchased Sheen.

I'd E then go to Q a minion and he'd do this super slow motion bringing down of the cane onto the minion at like 100th normal speed and he was like going semi-airborne during it.

replies.body: I had the same problem the last time I played nasus. But it was happening to me as I was getting lag spikes. Might be a bug or just lag, who knows.
Think it's a bug coz my ping was fine and it wasn't doing time catch up afterwards it was just taking me several years for my Q animation to complete.
